item.description:
This event kicks off 2 days of Somerville Open Studios.

The Somerville Open Studios Pancake Breakfast at the Nave Gallery in the Clarendon Hill Presbyterian Church takes place on Saturday, May 1 from 9 am - 12 noon.

The cost is $7.00 and includes all the pancakes you can eat and all the coffee and juice you can drink.

After breakfast, consider checking out the Open Studios all over Somerville.

I will be there at 10 am.

Parking available at West Somerville Neighborhood School lot off Raymond Avenue or at meters 3 blocks south on Broadway.

MBTA access Davis Square Bus 88 or 15 minute walk from Davis Square Red Line.

www.clarendonhillchurch.org
www.navegallery.org
www.somervilleopenstudios.org
www.cityofsomerville.gov
item.name: Somerville Open Studios Pancake Breakfast at The Nave Gallery
